评论详情: I purchased this dress for my post wedding farewell brunch and I love it. It's lightweight, fits really well, the bust is nice and stretchy and I love the detailing at the bottom. Our honeymoon is in Puerto Vallarta and it's sort of reminds me of a Mexican type style of dress. It did have quite a few wrinkles but a quick steam takes them all out. I tried on a few dresses that were very similar that were see through but this one isn't see through at all. However, it does have a slip that gets a little staticky, so be mindful of that. Overall this is a great dress and I can't wait to wear this to our brunch as well as while we're in Mexico on our honeymoon!
This dress fit great! True to size and I've received many compliments. I'd absolutely recommend!

Bought this expensive dress for approx $63.00 in white for my daughter. She loved it and wanted another  in navy blue.  Tag says 100% Rayon and Made in China. While browsing internet I came across what appears to be and looks like the very same dress I bought, ONLY a they sell for approx $16.99 with a few dollars shipping. No, there is not the Zesica name tag but pics in all the exact same colors look the same and state Made in China, where the zesica brand is made. Of course it could be totally different , who knows.I WENT AHEAD and ordered the EXPENSIVE navy dress on here and it arrived today, and looks very nice but extremely wrinkled , like the white one was.I was still curious about what looks like the same exact pics but much cheaper price dress and low and behold I found a listing right here on Amazon.  Appears to me to match same pics of name brand, expensive versions I bought. We shall see.  These sell for $18.99 with a 6% off coupon, and a shipping fee. Total was $25.27.  YES, I purchased a white one in a size Small for my younger daughter JUST TO SEE HOW DIFFERENT IT IS GOING TO BE from the name brand $63.00 ones. Since it’s too good to be true I am assuming this cheaper dress will be sub par in a way, who knows? Seller on Amazon  is eipogp and description starts with “ Womans Tube top maxi dress summer boho strapless——.I think this is interesting and will UPDATE everyone after I receive the white dress I ordered for a mere $25.27 ( same pic as expensive ones) . Says arriving July 2— July15Don’t know if Amazon will put this through, if not I will write another reviewUPDATE—UPDATE- UPDATE—. Rec this dress and started a return. The clear plastic bag dress was packaged in has large black letters stating “ ZANZEA “  ( Remember, the expensive dress I bought in white ,and my other daughter loved was from “ ZESICA”. This dress was a completely different material, like a shinny polyester. Daughter did not like material. Also, it did not have the sewn in interior slip like the expensive ZESICA dress. She said she did want to have to wear a slip. Also, it was about 5 to 6” shorter than the expensive ZESICA dress and she said it was too short. OVERALL though, in my opinion ( as daughters mom) for the price and if you don’t mind wearing a slip , and it was a good length for you, and it did not hang as well as the expensive one, I thought many people would probably be ok with this dress for the price.

评论概述: True to Size, good quality beautiful dress!
评论详情: Don't even think twice, buy it! It's excellent quality, fits well, not see-through, true-to-size, and the halter part doesn't slide down. If you aren't big chested, however, I may size down as the top stretches very well. For reference, I bought a size Large and I am 40DD, 175 pounds, 5'6.

I bought this white sundress for a cruise I was going on this past summer. It was a good price, the material is so soft and flowy, but isn’t see through. When I packed it, I rolled it up(like a burrito) and packed it that way. Once on the cruise ship, when I went to hang it up it still looked beautiful with no wrinkles! I got so many compliments wearing this dress, I had women and men all night saying it looked amazing. This dress was a winner, I think it would look amazing on all body types:)
I wore this white dress at dinner at a Caribbean resort. It’s flattering, nice fit, white seemed beach appropriate.

I sized down. Usually a large but it’s very stretchy and I wanted it to have a nicer fit. The material is nice and loved it in white. Lightweight breathable. It comes with a built in slip, either way I wore a slip just in case because of the color I wanted. But I’m sure one doesn’t need one with darker colors.
Dress fits well- super comfortable and flattering - will buy it in multiple colors as it is extremely flattering
Love this dress.  Super cute,  easy to style, and comfortable. Would purchase again.
Perfect fit, true to size. So comfy, so many compliments! Can dress up or down!
Perfect for a night out with a jean jacket or lounging around the pool. The dress is super soft and very flattering

评论概述: Flowed pretty, but wrinkled easy, and halter top material was odd
评论详情: I debated keeping this dress as it did flow nicely over curves and the material felt nice on the skirt. But, the downsides were the halter top material was oddly puckered and looked like the seams were off. I don't think the elastic in it would've lasted long and the puckering I feared would've potentially stretched out in a weird way when wearing.  It also seemed like it would be in a wrinkled state most the time. If it would've been considerably cheaper, I would've probably kept and maybe added a jacket and a belt.

I bought this dress in the color Rose for my baby shower next week. Overall it’s a really cute dress. It’s not a thick dress but it has a built in slip so it’s not see through. I’m 5’0 and 8 months pregnant ( not a massive bump but I’m bumping ) and the dress meets right at the top of my feet , so I’m happy it’s not too long. I would size down because the top seems a little big. I bought an XL and I’m comfortably a 42 DD and the top is a little loose. Overall do I think this dress is worth $45 ( bought dress during prime day) ? No, I’d pay maybe $25-$30.. but it’s a cute dress and now I have my baby shower dress.
Fits great. True to size.
Wore this dress to an outside wedding and felt so comfortable and pretty.
I loved this dress for a beach vacation where I had family photos taken
I bought the navy dress. It was cute, however, the navy color seemed more violet than navy.
I got this dress for engagement pictures and it was everything I wanted and more!! Flowy, stretchy, and so comfy. I’ll definitely be wearing it again!

评论概述: Bummed it didn't work out, Super Cute
评论详情: I'm larger up top and just can't pull off an empire waist.  Loved the weight, material and design.  Even has a little built in slip to it, that stops short of the crochet trim.  I'm so bummed this didn't work for me - but waist was just completely lost in this and it looked more like a Mumu on me.  I did order a size smaller and glad I did, there is a lot of stretch to this dress.
Worked well in cruise wardrobe
Loved the dress, but it was a bit big - the top section was longer than I needed and bunched up a bit in the back. I am a true large, and I could have sized down. It is very stretchy.

The fabric could be thicker/more wrinkle resistant for the high price (feels like items I’d buy for half the price). Great summer dress though. Got it in dark brown and looks really nice for casual wear.  Update after first wash, I put it in the dryer and it did shrink a little. Still nice but where it fell to the tops of my feet, it’s now an once or so above my ankle. Top doesn’t seem smaller; so overall still fits well just shorter which isn’t bad but fyi
This is a late response. I might have to return with a picture. This is super cute! I really want the brown and black dress to add to my collection.  I will be buying more.

Almost a 5.  Not sure why I didn't, because I do love it!  Maybe it's missing something.  The white is not see through.  I got away with nude underwear.  If you wear another color... yes, you will see it.  I think it's a keeper and will wear again.

I get compliments on it all the time, I love this dress! I do think it is overpriced for what you get, but I will say that I love this dress and have been wearing it weekly for over a month. It is not see through, and the brown color is gorgeous and perfect for Fall. Like I said, it feels more like a $29 dress, but it is the only dress like this that I could find that was brown.
I absolutely love this dress! Perfect for the summer, makes me feel so beautiful!

评论概述: I wanted to like this so much…
评论详情: … but it fell short of expectations. Extremely thin material. Returned. :(
It was for my daughter in law

I bought this and it’s ok. It’s good that you can’t see through it or anything like that, it’s made well. But don’t know if I would recommend to anyone, it’s not for short women! It’s definitely too long for me. I had to send it to a friend to take the length up. So just more money spent.
Perfect for day or night

Very pretty ! 36DDD, 5’9, 160 and fit well. Flattering and very nice material. Could be a little tighter on top and I bought a medium, and I’m large Chested. I would think the top might be a little big for some. Overall a nice dress.

This dress is beautiful-- my husband loved it, but the stretchy part covered from my boobs down to my belly button and my mama body didn't love that. Was hoping it'd be like a fit and flare but the length of the top came down way too far on me or would've had to been really bunchy up top. If big chested, this would've worked!

Great on point fit, nice fabric that gives it a nice flow.  Wish it was a little longer. I am 5’6” and really wouldn’t wear any heels with it. Good with flats. I thought a Medium normally wear a size 8.
I did like this dress a lot but returned it. the white was giving too much wedding vibes for me. The top also folded in a weird spot when you would bend. I suggest to size down

This is a nice white strapless summer dress. I loved the detail on the dress and the material was nice too. I am almost 5'4", 134lbs and ordered a medium. It fit but I just didn't love how it looked on me. Its a cute dress though!

This dress is cute and fits true to size. The dress did shrink even after following washing instructions. I liked the dress enough to return it for a replacement though. I will most likely hand wash ir wash in delicate and hang to dry next time.

I do like the material, it’s soft and flowy. Very prone to wrinkles. The elastic is quite snug in the waist which isn’t very flattering. For the price, I wish the top portion looked better. Color is a great vibrant turquoise blue. For reference I’m 5’8” 34C 125 lbs and ordered my usual size small.

评论概述: Flattering, super cute and easy to wear dress
评论详情: I absolutely adore and love this dark blue strapless dress! I am 5 feet tall and weigh between 135-140lbs. I got a medium and it fits great. It is a little long on me but I typically wear sandals with a thicker heel. The elastic across the chest is tight but not suffocating! It is not see through but it’s light weight. I wear this with a light cardigan or jean jacket. I want this in more colors for sure! It can get wrinkly BUT that’s also kinda the dress too so no worries if you can’t iron it! Washed well. Didn’t fade or bleed into other clothes in the wash.

My daughter ordered this for her senior pics. It was just as described. Fit was perfect. The material was a little wrinkly from shipping and the flower details at the bottom needed quite a bit of ironing, but it was just what she was looking for.. cool, casual, and cute!
Beautiful fit! This is great if you want to hide curves and I love the dress but it runs big. I ordered large but need to exchange it for a medium.

Didn’t fit me well. I’d say you need to be at least 5’8” with a C cup for the Large. I’m 5’4” and it didn’t sit well on my waist and felt a little heavy. If I was a D cup though, it’d be different. It’s pretty though!
Product quality is just fine. But the smocking even in the xs still doesn’t fit me.

评论概述: I wore it to a celebration of life.
评论详情: I love all things Zesica. This summer dress did not disappoint. I wore it to a friend's memorial and it was muted enough to be respectful yet pretty enough to bring a positive light to the ceremony. What a beautiful light periwinkle blue! But drats! I accidentally left it at my sister's. She better mail it back doon too! Lol ....so I found a close color to describe this very feminie summer dress. See swatch above. Perfect for my shape as it was cut perfectly. Im a bit top heavy. I wear a large, 5'8", 150lbs
Super cute dress and looks nicer than it is! Wore it in Hawaii to a couple fancy dinners
So cute and comfortable! Love how versatile this dress is! Can be styled casual or dressy depending on the accessories. Well worth the price!
Loved the dresses!! Many compliments!

Fit perfectly and the red color is just like the model picture and even prettier than I thought it would be. Nice airy flowy dress for the Mexico heat and humidity.  I never had to pull it up even when I thought I needed to just by habit of wearing crop tops.  Definitely Recommend!

评论概述: I'm on the fence about this dress
评论详情: This dress style is beautiful. It's fitted on top and flowy below the bust. Perfect for hiding a tummy. The material is a gauze-type rayon fabric. Hence the recommendation for dry cleaning. This type of fabric tends to shrink a lot in the wash and definitely requires ironing. That said, it's doable to hand wash or wash on delicate, and hang dry.  The reason I'm not sure if I'll keep the dress or not is because it's very see-through. I bought the navy color thinking that the darker shade wouldn't be as noticeable, but I'm pretty sure people will be able to see through it regardless of the dark color. There is no lining in the dress to help with this issue.  Apart from the thin fabric, the dress is beautiful. The style is flattering and it's very comfortable. I'm consistently a Large (size 12) so I ordered a Large and it fits great. As for length, I'm 5' 5" and it hits about 4-5 inches above the top of my foot.
Love this dress have worn multiple times. Super comfy
Beautiful dress. I definitely suggest sizing down if you’re in between sizes. Be aware that the white is not pure white. Still very pretty though!
This is the perfect spring/summer dress. It’s true to size and extremely comfortable!
Beautiful detail, not see through (has a slip under) Cute boho look - great material

I bought this dress for family photos at the beach and it did not disappoint. It does wrinkle pretty easily, but the top is pretty stretchy and hides the wrinkles. The bottom is very flowy and comfortable. Also lightweight. I highly recommend it. The price was right.

I live in South Texas where it's super hot in the summer and this dress is my GO TO.  It's so cute and comfortable.  I love wearing it with a cute summer hat, sparkly earrings and a pair of wedges.  I even have multiple colors!

I love the aqua color of this dress, the material is definetley not see through because its on the thicker side, which is what I didnt like, its a little too thick to wear in the summer here in So Cal or in humid Florida!  I also don't care for the top bandeau part, something seems wrong w/the material as it really doesn't conform to your body so I see this sliding down and having to readjust it a lot and who wants to do that?  Its pretty but I dont like the feel or look of it on unfortunatly! For reference Im 5'07", 130 Lbs and a 34c and ordered a small and the top just felt too loose..

This dress is insanely cute. My daughter and I both wore this through Europe. It’s lightweight and super stretchy. We are not the same size but it fit both of us perfectly because of the elastic in the top and loose waist. She is a true XS and I would normally wear a small. Buy it- you won’t regret it
Beautiful fit, color and material. It was true to size. I'm 5.5" and about 145 pounds, with size B/C chest. Size  medium fit me perfectly.

I ordered this dress in white- size Medium. I probably could have ordered a small and it would have fit fine. I am usually a size 4. This dress is very pretty and has such nice detail to it. I am 5'2" and it comes just above my ankle. I washed it on delicate in warm water as directed it didn't shrink. I am very satisfied with my purchase I personally think this is a beautiful dress and it is not cheaply made. Cant wait to wear this on my vacation.

Loved this dress but I went by Amazing sizing and it was too big.  Many issues receiving as Amazon shipped first dress out with my AutoShip of dog oil and there was a notice of undeliverable due to damage of both items. So I had to Call Amazon and have re-ordered only to find out it was too big. But the dress itself is beautiful and it's a beautiful blue color. Unfortunately, I opted not to re-order as I've had too many delays and failures with shipments arriving on time and I had wanted it for my cruise.
Great dress it flows easily. I received so many compliments on it.

I got this to wear in Mexico for my 50th birthday trip. I got so many compliments. The color is stunning. I got a small. For reference, I have a large bust on a small frame. Bra size is 32G and I usually wear a size 4 on the bottom and small on top. I had plenty of room in the dress and if I wore heels or wedges the length was perfect (I am 5'3"). If you are thinking about buying this, do it!

I love this dress. The fabric looks and feels great for summer. The fit is super comfortable. I have a pear shape body, I’m a size M for tops and size L for bottoms, I bought the medium and fits perfect. I will be getting this dress in another color!
This dress worked wonderfully for the derby! Very pretty, needed a little steam, and nude underwear are a must.
True to size, flowy, fits great! Love the whole dress! I wore it for family pictures and also got so many compliments on it. Not super fancy, great for a backyard party or outdoor function.
Cute dress, not see through

评论概述: Looks just like the picture and great quality
评论详情: Loved this dress. The color was beautiful and easy to steam to get wrinkles out. The top can be a bit loose, but mostly stayed in place. Was breathable and perfect for day to night.

评论概述: Easiest thing to wear - and flattering!
评论详情: I love this dress so much that I have also bought it in black and watermelon.  I put them on just to hang around the house or dress them up to go out. The fabric is nice and heavy and not see through at all. Very comfortable. Looks great with or without a belt. Very versatile. I may buy it in even more colors. I'm 5' 10", 120 lbs. Measurements: 36" bust, 28" waist, 36" hips. Size small fits me great.

I always read reviews. A few said this is see through. It is NOT see through. It has a slip underneath. I bought it and was very happy with the quality, style and color. I wore to an outdoor graduation that was around 90 degrees and stayed cool (the point of ordering this dress!) I will also be taking this on vacation as a casual dress. Its really flattering and cute!

I love this dress! I have it in 4 colors! I always get compliments and pair it with a little denim jacket and sandals or flats and boots for the fall. It washes beautifully and is very light and airy.
Used for pictures at an outdoor summer event. I’m not small or large chested. Right in the middle and the dress held up well. Would definitely get in other colors

This summer dress exceeded my expectations. It’s beautiful! I’m in love with it!. For reference, I’m 511, 146 pounds- Normally, I wear a size medium, but I ordered a size small. Dresses tend to run on the larger side. Overall fit is perfect! Quality is excellent! I’m about to order it in more colors! Worth every penny! Go for it ladies!
I bought this and used it for my wedding rehearsal. It fit perfect, very comfortable. I also wore on our cruise for our honeymoon. Loved it so much bought it and two other colors!
Purchased this for an all white party on a boat. Comfortable, flattering and cute. Can dress up or down.
I ordered this for beach pictures and it was perfect! It is very flattering.  The fit was comfortable and I love the color. I would highly recommend this!
This is a cute summer staple dress. It looks like the pictures. But it’s worth maybe $20. I wish I’d gone to Target instead.
The length was perfect on my 5’4 height, could definitely fit taller but not much shorter.
Bought it for myself, but my daughter took off with it!
This dress is true to size and flattering! Awesome for summer!
This dress is perfect. Super comfy, perfect length and weight of fabric. The elastic is plenty on top and I am small there.
The dress was too big the top was to long and the  top of the smocking was to thin and would not hold you in well. The color was pretty though .
Pretty, and color is accurate.  It runs a lttle big.  I am 5'5" and 145.  Average chest size.  It runs a little large on me.

If you are looking for the perfect evermore dress get this dress in yellow!!!!! (It’s almost exact except for the sleeves) I’m going to pair it with a green cape and wear it to the eras tour this summer! I had the best luck, I bought an xl and it fits great. The top is pretty stretchy but the bottom isn’t.

I am just under 5 feet tall and as I have aged, I've become somewhat round. I can never buy these wonderful dresses because they are always so long but this one is a real shocker. It's the perfect length and it fits ideally. I highly recommend this product.

评论概述: Exactly what we were looking for
评论详情: My daughter needed a summer dress for her senior photos and this was exactly what we were looking for. Perfect fit - didn’t easily fall down and was t too tight up top either. My daughter is 5’4” and the small was a perfect length for her

评论概述: Fits surprisingly well even if you are a small or XS
评论详情: The dress fit well. I feel too skinny sometimes, but this dress fit well in every area. I didn't feel too slim at all. I ordered "peach." It's definitely pinky coral and I am not sure it goes with my skin tone. I may look into other colors.
I am 5' 3 and 150 lbs felt little shorter than  I like quality was what  I expected, just didn't love on me
This dress is perfect for the summer!

Although I have not washed it yet, I love everything about it! Seems to be well-made with lots of cute details and trim. I am 5’6, 150 pounds and I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly! If you’re on the fence about this, you should buy it!
Want a cheap but cute dress this is it! I wore it for a wedding and it was super cute
This dress fit very well, is a great length, and the fabric is not see through. The black can be dressed up or down.
It was absolutely beautiful & fit to a T!! I wore it for my wedding day & I felt so comfortable & beautiful. Thank you.
The fabric was heavy which is nice but also hot. I'm curvy and it felt like maternity wear. I didn't like how it looked or felt on but it's a very beautiful design.  I ended up returning it.

I have a love-hate relationship with dresses. I love to get dolled up, but I hate wearing a dress. This dress is so lightweight and flowy that it is great for hot weather. I don't wear many strapless dresses because my chest is so large, but I saw a vlogger with a large chest try it on, and I had to try it. I bought it and was super excited about the outcome. I wore white undergarments just in case I got wet or if it was see-through, but my husband ensured me it was not. What a great dress to buy and save for that perfect summer event. I wore it to a work event, and I didn't feel too dressed up; I just felt pretty. I wear a size Medium to Large shirt and 8-10 pant size and I bought a medium and it fit great. I also bought it in purple.
Wore this dress for our beach pics. Cute and comfortable. Flowy. I received a lot of compliments.
It fit well for any size and the best thing about this white dress , it’s not see through

I love this dress!  Not only is it flattering but it's super comfortable and I can get away with not wearing a bra (i'm a B cup).  I'm 5'4" 113 lbs with an hourglass figure and the XS fit perfectly.  The brown color goes well against my mocha skin tone.
This dress is gorgeous and comfortable - not an easy combo to find for us curvy busty girls.  This dress is beyond flattering.  Found it to be true to size, the white is gorgeous.
Dress fit perfect and it pretty and good material

I am getting more colors. that's all there is too it. lol. I ordered a medium and it fits great. I am 5'4 and about 150 pounds, 36 DD. The fit is awesome. the top is stretchy and fits the girls in nice. The fuchsia color is so pretty and looks like the picture. It is wrinkly , as to be expected, but a steamer is your friend with this one. I would definitely recommend this dress. Very happy.

I ordered this dress for my granddaughter to wear in her senior photo shoot.  It was beautiful and the XS fit her to a tee.  I ordered on Friday and it arrived as scheduled on Sunday morning.  Love to order from Amazon.  I have never had a problem with my orders.
